title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 23-4.3 - Access to excavations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 23-4.3 - Access to excavations

State Regulations

Ladders, stairways or ramps constructed in compliance
with this Part (rule) shall be provided in every excavation more than three
feet in depth for safe access and egress. Such ladders, stairways or ramps
shall be installed in sufficient number and in such locations as to be readily
accessible to any person wishing to enter or leave such excavation without more
than 25 feet of lateral travel. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
23-4.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
